function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to nature and natural elements in the built environment may lead to a lack of biophilic connections and reduced well-being.","Impact":"Decreased mental and physical well-being of occupants, reduced productivity, and diminished sense of connection to nature.","Mitigation":"Incorporating biophilic design principles in the built environment, providing access to natural light, green spaces, and natural patterns.","Technologies":"Biophilic design elements such as living walls, green roofs, daylighting systems, and natural ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, residents, and workers in the built environment.","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building developers."}]}
